newsitem.title: JAPAN: Toray awards pet drug rights to France's Virbac.
newsitem.headline: Toray awards pet drug rights to France's Virbac.

text.p: Toray Industries Inc said on Tuesday that it had awarded the rights to develop and market its Intercat pet drug in Europe to Virbac SA of France.
Under the agreement, Virbac will work with Toray in conducting the clinical tests needed to acquire approval for the drug from European authorities, Toray said in a statement.

The company described Intercat as a "recombinant feline interferon agent for pets". Toray has been marketing the drug in Japan since 1994 as an antiviral agent for treating feline cold infections, Toray said.
Development and marketing rights for Intercat in the Americas have already been awarded to Schering-Plough Corp of the United States, Toray said.
